name: CSPProvider
description:
Provides a default Content Security Policy (CSP) configuration for Base UI components that
require inline `<style>` or `<script>` tags.

disableStyleElements.description: Whether inline `<style>` elements created by Base UI components should not be rendered. Instead, components must specify the CSS styles via custom class names or other methods.

nonce.description: The nonce value to apply to inline `<style>` and `<script>` tags.
